start.annotation: L’arbor gentil che forte amai molt’anni

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_line r06_s r07_phr

LMNL.text: L’arbor gentil che forte amai molt’anni,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r08_line r09_phr

LMNL.text: mentre i bei rami non m’ebber a sdegno

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r09_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r09_phr r10_line

LMNL.text: fiorir faceva il mio debile ingegno

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r09_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r09_phr r11_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r11_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r11_line r12_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r14_line r15_s r16_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r14_line r15_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r14_line r15_s r17_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r15_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r15_s r18_line r19_phr

LMNL.text: fece di dolce sé spietato legno,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r15_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r15_s r20_line r21_phr

LMNL.text: i’ rivolsi i pensier’ tutti ad un segno,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r15_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r15_s r22_line r23_phr

LMNL.text: che parlan sempre de’ lor tristi danni.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_tercet r26_line r27_s r28_phr

LMNL.text: Che porà dir chi per amor sospira,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_tercet r27_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_tercet r27_s r29_line r30_phr

LMNL.text: s’altra speranza le mie rime nove

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_tercet r27_s r30_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_tercet r27_s r30_phr r31_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_tercet r27_s r31_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_tercet r27_s r31_line r32_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r34_line r35_s r36_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r34_line r35_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r34_line r35_s r37_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r35_s r37_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r35_s r37_phr r38_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r35_s r38_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r35_s r38_line r39_phr

LMNL.text: et al Sol venga in ira,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r35_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r33_tercet r35_s r40_line r41_phr

LMNL.text: tal che si secchi ogni sua foglia verde.
